channel.title: SHARE Covid-19 :: SHARE-CZ Project in the Czech Republic
channel.description: SHARE-Covid19 CATI Project SHARE collected two special surveys on Covid19 both in CATI mode. The first survey was collected in June-August 2020, the second CATI was collected in summer 2021. In addition, the Czech Republic added an additional CATI-CZ Covid19 survey in October-December 2020. All three surveys have a panel structure with repeated questions to capture changes in our respondents lives during the pandemic. All CATI Covid19 data have been linked to main longitudinal SHARE data.
